titleStmt.title: A brief apologie for all non-subscribers, and looking-glasse for all apostate perjured prescribers & subscribers of the new engagement, wherein they may clearly behold their presidents, sin, horrour, punishment.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffebr. 18."; the '50' in imprint date has been altered to "49".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. .
